Subject: Get Energy - end year reconciliation request as of 31.12.2024

 

Dear Partner

 

I hope this email finds you well. We would like to ask you specify your outstanding (receivables/payables) balance as of 31.12.2024 which is EUR                          (from/to) Get Energy Trading S.R.L. 

 

We kindly ask you to specify the outstanding balance according to your records.

 

Your prompt response with the above request will be appreciated. If no response is received from your side within next 15 days from the date of this email, it shall be presumed that the outstanding balance we have is accurate and confirmed by you. 

 

Regards

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Anil Turamanlar

Finance Specialist
